# Customer-centric Website Design Services | Experience-first UI UX Solutions

Experience design services for improved digital shopping experiences! Build consistent, connected, and cohesive UI UX with our experience-first design solutions.


Back To Services Experience Design (CX/UX) Overview Bringing customer experience to the front with a design approach that is seamless, subtle, and personalized. Be it a service, product, or brand, we create design experiences that leave a mark! Our design thinking approach is focused on users at every step of their decision journey. We strive to offer shopping experiences that are delightful, seamless, quick, secure, consistent, convenient, and personalized. Our CX experts see your business through the eyes of your customers. Why should one invest in UX? 9900% Whopping ROI Every $1 invested in UX brings $100 in return 40% Bounce rate increases If users find the layout or interaction of a website shabby 83% People expect Seamless experience across all devices Source: Intechnic Schedule a Call CX → UX → UI CX → UX → UI and importance UX, UI, and CX are very different from one another, but are intrinsically linked and wholly dependent on each other. We practice designing products/services with a focus on the quality and thoughtfulness of the user experience. 01 Attracting New Customers Quality UI design will encourage customers to engage more on our site. It can be play as a differentiator for any brand i.e. make it stand out and get people to interact with your brand. 02 Enhanced Customer Loyalty If customers are happy and delighted with their buying experience, they will become loyal advocates for your brand and help you expand your market share. 03 Cost Saving A user-friendly, intuitive design can save time, minimize errors, and prove to be cost-effective in the later stages. It also reduces bounce rate and complaints with customer support, which in result reduce the expenses. 04 Higher Conversions Organized and easy to use experiences lead to an improved buying journey – which in return leads to higher conversions and customer satisfaction. What we do? With the latest industry standards and trends, our customer-centric approach ensures design experiences that are loved by all. We combine creative vision with compelling design to drive innovation and reinvent how businesses engage with customers. Let's Get Started 1 Buyer Persona Definition By understanding buyer personas, we try to create a niche, relevant, and personalized shopping experiences for brands. It is based on market research and actual data about the brand's existing customers. Segment audience and contacts Allows to focus on the challenges Understand business pains Give direction for marketing & content 2 Design System We create brands with design system i.e. guided by clear standards. It provides a convenient, centralized, and evolving map of a brand identity. Conducting a visual audit Visual design language UI/pattern library Brand Guideline & Documentation 3 Customer Journey Mapping We follow the customer journey map to go through the stages and how they engage with the brand - be it a product, an online experience, or a purchase experience. Provides insightful information Highlights gaps or complexities Customers journey at the sales funnel Helps for sales and marketing 4 Data flow We create flow with users' sentiments, needs, and desires - the context in which they use a product - journey from the entry to a digital store through the decision making i.e., product purchase Helps to communicate ideas Logical information of the system Identify user needs and goals Helps to understand system scope, dependencies and deficiencies in it. 5 Workable Prototype We try different tools of prototyping to test the efficiency of design. It gives the ability to test and see if the solutions and decisions made about the product are efficient. Low-fidelity or High-fidelity prototypes Gives realistic interactions Easy to share and get feedback Can improve as and when require 6 UI Design We believe visual design is as important as intuitive interactive design for creating a smooth and coherent user experience. Understanding brand digital needs Follow brand guidelines Clear and logical designs Better UX and better solutions Our Experts Our seasoned CX expert holds more than 15 years of industry experience and are skilled in offering hyper-personalized experience design that enables your brand to portray a seamless and consistent brand experience. Falguni Desai LEAD UI/UX DESIGNER Schedule A Meet Our work in action B2C & Marketplace UAE Consumer Goods Flowing towards enhanced brand visibility with strategic digital marketing View Case Study B2C UAE Beauty & Health Taking Freshness to the Next Level with 43% Increased Mobile Traffic View Case Study B2C Middle East Consumer Goods Meeting B2C Marketplace Needs with 27% Boost in AOV View Case Study B2C North America Fashion and Apparel Amplifying success for USA's adventure giant with data-driven marketing View Case Study Frequently Asked Questions What is Experience Design? Improving your customer experience on every level of the customer journey from touchpoint to touchpoint is usually called experience design. Since customer experience optimization is an ongoing process, it focuses on understanding your customers and the customer lifecycle to make every interaction with your brand coherent and pleasant. How is experience design important for your digital business? Starting from the first click on your digital store till the customer support stage, your customer experience needs to be optimized to its fullest potential. It can establish an unforgettable user experience, build a rapport with the customers, and enhance your ROI while giving an optimized digital experience. What does Krish offer in terms of Experience Design services? Our seasoned professionals offer both qualitative and quantitative customer insights that help optimize the digital experience. They are skilled in conducting surveys and interviews to analyze customer needs, customer expectations, and experience while interacting with your brand. With that, you can make informed decisions in the future. At Krish, we help our clients with Buyer Persona Definition, Design Systems, Customer Journey Mapping, Data flows, and User Interface Designs. What is the cost of getting your experience design strategy devised by Krish? Experience Design can be a vast service that may cover multiple aspects such as the size, platform, nature, and several areas of improvement your digital business might require. Once all of these are determined well, we can help you maintain a seamless and positive customer experience. Get in touch with us for more information. Trusted by leading brands
